aka: Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation - Caught in the Act!
史派克与麦克恶心与变态动画节第三辑
this_title: Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation - Caught in the Act!
trans_title: 史派克与麦克恶心扭曲卡通节
Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation - Caught in the Act!
史派克与麦克恶心与变态动画节第三辑
introduction: 残酷漫画，也许你看过HTF-Happy Tree Friends这原本是个成人残酷漫画集锦影音杂志后来不断发展壮大。作品以短篇为主充满大胆想象力并且不受任何道德理念限制完全是成年向解压作品。
chinese_title: 史派克与麦克恶心扭曲卡通节
foreign_title: Spike and Mike's Sick and Twisted Festival of Animation - Caught in the Act!
